transcript:
Customer: Ab mujhko mera ehsas nahi, dil kehta hai bas unhi se, ke thoda thoda pyaar hua tumse ke tum.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, good evening sir, IndiaMART se bol rahi hu.
Customer: Ji badhiya.
Executive: Mai Hansika baat kar rahi hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir feedback janna tha aapka services ke regarding.
Customer: Ji thodi der me baat kariye, mai gaadi par hu.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai sir mai kab call karu aapko?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is busy and cannot talk right now.



Resolution:

- Executive asked when to call back.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, services, call back
